NOT_UUID_QUERY: The query parameter {key} is not UUID.
INVALID_DATE: {property} must be a valid ISO 8601 date string.
INVALID_PHONE: {property} phone must be a line in the format +7 (XXX) XXX-XX-XX.
MIN: {property} with value: "{value}" needs to be at least {constraints.0}, ow and {message}
MAX: {property} with value: "{value}" needs to be less than {constraints.0}, ow and {message}
